alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:18AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 345 AM EDT... At 317 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Grove City to 6 miles south of Slippery Rock to near Ellwood City. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butler, Clarion, Knox, Rimersburg, Ellwood City, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Meridian, Ellport, Prospect, Chicora, East Brady, Parker, East Butler, Sligo, Emlenton, Strattanville, Bruin, Clintonville, and Limestone. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 92 and 97. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 30 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence; Venango
